CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1953, pg. 3, reads: "Faces Murder Trial - Leonard Allen, 27-year-old Breckenridge (Pa.) worker, faces a first-degree murder conviction in fatal beating of William Ritter, 52-year-old white man, last June 30, during an alleged robbery attempt. Allen went on trial in Criminal Court Tuesday.  Lloyd Barnes, also indicted for the murder, will be tried later, and may testify against Allen. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Police officer in three piece suit and badge walking with handcuffed Leonard Allen, in corridor of Allegheny County Courthouse
